Don L. Hotson, Dirac's Equation and the Sea of Negative Energy, Issue 44, 2002, p.16

"Time and again we find scientists saying, in effect, 'These are the theories on which I base my facts.' This is what the Churchmen told Galileo. Discounting measured data because it disagrees with a theory is the antithesis of science."
alfredsnippet.name: Phys.org Post - These Are the Theories on Which I Base My Facts
